entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
